website_summaries.verdict: The most versatile portable DVD player on the market. It's well-built, has nearly every feature you could ask for, and is affordable.
pros: It's got both video inputs and outputs, so you can connect it to your TV or play any of your own digital content
The 9.5-inch screen is gorgeous, and it's also designed to reduce eye strain
cons: It has games on board, but you need to buy the controller separately
Some users complain that the speakers aren't loud enough

customer_reviews.title: The audio is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. The audio actually scared me with how loud it was when i turned it on. Tiny speakers, but tons of sound. The screen size and color are great. This is going to be a great addition to our road trip happening soon. Not to mention if the hotels dont have good cable, we can plug our DVD player in with the cords provided and watch all the movies we want. Also the packaging is stronger than i have ever seen. I may use it as an added safety for traveling. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on a six hour flight and it played 2 long movies 2 hours plus and I had music on a SD card and it played all of this with out loosing power. It was used both ways on this trip and I was glad I had this and very impressed with the battery life it made our trip go by fast. The only thing I see that could have been made better is the door switch for th CD player, seems to be a little flimsy. Other than that very happy with this player and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Edison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: We just received this in the mail today. It is an excellent DVD player with great video quality. I like that it has dual headphone jacks and that I can use an SD card to play movie that I have downloaded. The "red" exterior is more of a fuscia but my 4 year old loves it. It also came with a car charger, wall charger, remote, and the av cables to connect it to a tv.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette V walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD player perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable DVD player perfect for camping in our trailer. This DVD player has some great features such has a 5 hour play time when fully charged up which is great for tent camping when no electric is available. Another great thing about this unit is not only does it play DVD's but you can also use SD cards to watch playback from digital video cameras which is really cool. We got digital video cameras and then at the end of the day would show off some of the footage we got which was really fun. Overall pretty impressed with this DVD player and it's a great value for the price if you travel or camp a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome colors!
customer_reviews.text: These DVD players are great so far. We bought two of them (hot pink and green) for the kids to watch movies on the plane. My little one loved it so much he prefers to watch movies on it in the house. The colors are fun and bright and I was so glad I could get two of the same product in different colors so the kids could have their own. The screen is so much bigger than our old player without being obnoxious. They are also very light weight. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile company; you should buy this player
customer_reviews.text: I got a faulty player it was a fluke that was not ieGeek's fault. They promptly refunded my money. What I can say about the player is it has a nice large screen, the color is super cute, the remote has so many options that you can control it like a normal t.v. and they are the best company I've ever dealt with through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: savanna

customer_reviews.title: ieGeek 12.5 inch Portable DVD Player with 360° Swivel Screen
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this ieGeek 12.5 inch Portable DVD Player with 360° Swivel Screen and I'm very happy with it! I love that is swivels 360 degrees. I also love that not only can i take it in any room of the house to do my exercise video or watch a movie while I cook, but I can also take it in the car. I travel with my grandchildren every summer and so this is going to come in real handy to keep them occupied while I'm driving. If you're thinking of a portable DVD player I highly recommend this one! And it's an affordable price as well! You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: SarahC

customer_reviews.title: not 12.5 HD screen, try more like less than 7
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. stated 12.5 HD screen and it is actually under 7 in screen and sound quality is also not good. Total rip off...
customer_reviews.author: magpie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dvd player to take on a long car trip with my family. It arrived on time and was packaged extremely well. I plugged it in to charge the battery up as the instructions said. I found that the player would not work on the battery function but did work if plugged into the wall or in my car. I contacted iegeek and they promptly responded and shipped me out a new one! I was absolutely happy with the customer service and fast shipping. The dvd player itself has great picture quality and having a remote will come in handy on the road. We look forward to seeing how it works for our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn t Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a month ago and waited to give it to my granddaughter for her birthday . Now it doesn t work . I can t get a picture when using a usb flash drive . this is the second one I bought , the first one I sent back because the dvd disk lid wouldn t close . I will have to trash it and buy something different but certainly not a ieGeek .
customer_reviews.author: yesican

customer_reviews.title: Portable DVD player with Outstanding Picture & Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ieGeek 12.5" portable DVD player for use on a long road trip this Christmas. We are so pleased with how easy it is to use, and with the picture clarity on the large screen. Our grandchildren are excited to use it, as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: If anything real or imagined is on a disc it freezes up. Rental discs always have a pick or something that stops up play. More than 1/2 my discs have something on them just from normal use. These are disc booboos you can't see. It's very disappointing. The remote is a nightmare for me. It has 44 small buttons all the same shape, size and feel. At least I can remember where the advance button is because the disc has stopped. The picture is so so. High contrast and middle values tend to kind of pixilate. This was not a good value player for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tucsonblossom

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT 100%
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product, great picture. Control remote can be used at 8 feet distance. Volume excellent. Sound excellent. The picture is very clear. A month ago I bought another DVD brand SYLVANIA, and had to return because volume and sound were horrible. so I'm so happy that I bought the ieGeek The only thing that I don't like and I trying to figure out is when I use the full screen with the ZOOM the letter ( ZOOM 3) doesn't go out from the screen ( ANY ADVICE FOR THAT?)
customer_reviews.author: TI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first dvd player I received was a bit of a lemon. It buzzed loudly and there was a yellow line running horizontally down the screen. When I notified the seller, they were very prompt in replacing the item. Now I am very happy with the dvd player. I would recommend purchasing an ieGeek, especially in terms of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Plays any region DVD
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very good on this model. I saw other reviews that praised the sound. I found that it isn't as loud as my region 1 portable dvd player. At full volume, it's only at a level that would be 14 (out of 20) on my other player. Also, some controls work better on the face of the dvd and others work better by using the remote control. The open lid can be hard to close. I found that it latches best when pressed just about the open button. I appreciate the freedom to watch dvds that aren't released in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for my daughter to use when we travel and we loved it. The screen turns 180 degrees which makes it very convenient. Very user friendly too and best customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep children busy
customer_reviews.text: This dvd player is great to keep children busy on road trip and plane rides, sometimes during long plane trips children have a hard time sleeping and this is the best way to keep them busy and quiet so they do not bother the rest of the people on the plane :) The Battery is rechargeable and lasts about five hours, it is light weight and easy to use it!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Portable dvd player
customer_reviews.text: Have no idea how they measure I thought screen was 12.5. I have a 10” screen player and this is same size. This is not 12.5”, so misleading. The motor has quite noticeable annoying motor-noise during play. customer response to received and helpful. After a month, the motor drive sound is annoying sitting furyhervaay from the unit solves this audible nuisance but volume does not raise enough to hear. I’ll keep it at 4 stars, but you should consider another company, possibly name brand if you can find.
customer_reviews.author: P. ColemanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2. Like both!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several players that appeared to be about the same feature wise. I sent two back due to audio/video sync issues. All my discs looked like an old Japanese monster movie with English dubbed in (poorly). This player seems fine so far. I’d recommend it. I run external powered speakers off the headphone jack an it makes a huge improvement in the overall experience for multiple viewers. All players are limited in space for larger speakers. If this review sounds familiar, it’s because I also bought the 11.5 inch version. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Deane Delli-Bovi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip, it didn’t even last a week. Had to buy a second unit on the road from Walmart, which has already outlasted this one. The video games I downloaded, it wouldn’t even let me select most of them from the unit. Missed the return window because our trip was delayed so now I’m stuck throwing it out. Waste of money, do not buy. Edit: customer service contacted me to try and fix the problem. They are issuing a refund since I had already bought one to replace this one. Customer service gets the stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Lovingessentialliving

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable DVD Player!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old and it is great, she loves it! It was the color I ordered and expected, everything was in the box that it said comes with it. The instructions were easy to understand and charge time was great, she watched two movies on first charge. The sound is good also. This is perfect for entertaining kids on long road trips. We will be taking it on our upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A.

customer_reviews.title: Great device - handy and useful everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 90 year old mother who cannot figure out how to work the TV and DVD together. This is perfect. She can play her DVD discs without a problem and can even watch them in her bedroom. There is also a USB so that we can tape the church services for her to watch. And it has a rechargeable battery, car cable and regular plug. The screen is big enough for viewing. All in all a great little device.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this DVD player! Just got ours yesterday and watched a movie. The picture quality and sound are great! I'd definitely recotthis product. I love the large screen size. I have 4 kids and just got the player, so haven't really tested durability yet. I'm going to try to keep it out of their hands 😁 Can't figure out how to change the brightness setting is all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I literally said "Oh my gosh" out loud when I received it.
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player came quickly, the packaging was very nicely done! I have actually never received something so nicely packed. I literally said, "Oh my gosh" when I opened the box because I was so impressed. The DVD player is very sleek looking and is a beautiful bright pink color. The screen tilts back and side to side. I'm impressed and will probably order another one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: This item DIED!!! Literally two days after a one month warranty
customer_reviews.text: Picture was good sound ok until it stopped working!! Worked last night, turned it off, turned on tonight it’s charged nothing! Not even trying to read if I can’t get are placement or my money back this vendor should be banned!!
customer_reviews.author: Art lover

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Original unit I received did not work. I was in contact with the vendor who immediately sent me a replacement. Vendor promptly followed up to be sure I was satisfied with the replacement. Vendor was courteous and easy to deal with. I am very happy with the product. Exceptionally sharp picture, much better than I expected at this price. Anything can go wrong occasionally but when I the vendor jumps through hoops to make it right I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of May but in early August it would not turn on either with the outlet or the battery. As directed by Amazon I contacted ieGeek customer service. Iris responded quickly and after a couple of conversations I was offered a replacement. It arrived in just a few days. I enjoy watching my DVD's on this portable player; I take it all over the house. I've had the replacement for about a week and everything is fine. I really appreciate the great customer service from ieGeek and Iris. Thanks. On October 2, 2019 the replacement DVD player also stopped turning on, with either the battery or AC. Awaiting a response from IeGeek customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Allcorn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for a road trip with my friends so we could sit in the backseat and watch well her parents drove and the road trip was canceled because of a virus so I don’t know how long the battery life as it took me a while to figure out the remote but I finally got that to work I like It it’s a little flimsy or than I expected but that’s OK I don’t really care overall it’s a very good quality it looks kind of cheap but it works just as good as a high-end one would
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: Great product right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and I am beyond impressed. Sharp color, nice sized buttons, and loudspeakers. I was able to play a DVD right out of the box as the battery came charged (nice touch) Comes with the car adaptor, wall charger, and cables for connecting to a TV as well as a very nice remote. Super happy with this purchase and will be buying more for my grandbabies.
customer_reviews.author: ChaddersLadyV

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for my niece and nephew for a road trip this summer and it is amazing. We can’t wait to continue to use them for years to come. It comes with a car charger and an outlet charger so no need to worry about the battery dying while on the go. We love the fact that the kids can watch their movies and not fight about who gets to pick what’s playing or just fighting in general. Hours of entertainment!! Oh and we love the fact that it comes with a remote!! Added bonus!! The picture quality is amazing and the sound is perfect. You can’t go wrong with purchasing one of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Screen is 10” diagonally
customer_reviews.text: Part of the reason I purchased this was because it seemed like the screen was bigger than others of a comparable price and it got good reviews. I have used only a couple of times, and it did well. However I was disappointed that it measures 12.5 inches from the edge of the plastic casing to the opposite edge, but when you measure it diagonally it is only 10 inches. I think the standard for measuring the size of the screen is to measure diagonally. So, this is not actually a 12.5 inch screen. Like others have said, the packaging is exceptional. I saved it so when I go on trips it is well cushioned and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea3433

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids are watching movies while grandma is driving!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very well packaged. It was very easy to use. The remote works great! It plugs into the television the ends are color coded so very simple. It has earphone access which also is easily used. You can also use USB OR CARD. My grand kids love it in the car. I'm thinking about getting another one. I would recommend it. The battery lasted for over 2 movies ( 4-5 hours). The price was very good considering everything you get and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this DVD player. I bought it and sent to my sister to watch on her journey here. When she got here a week later she told me it didn't work very well. I starting watching a movie and it just stops during the movie. About 2 seconds then starts again. It does this with every movie I have. That's what it did to my sister as well, right out of the box! This is my 3rd DVD player in 6 months. The only one that works decently is the smallest of all. So disappointed! I have it 2 stars because the battery is good and the remote is good. Sending this back!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great cd player!
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this mainly for cds to use with headphones, since laptops dont have players anymore. Bought this in stead of a portable cd player and to have a region free player as well. Anyhow, I am amazed at how great the cds sound, so much better I could hope for. Loud and clear. Feels solid and well made too. Totally satisfied for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Steinman

customer_reviews.title: Careful delivery!!! Great  packing in original box!!  Good picture and sound.....
customer_reviews.text: Well I 'heard' the arrival of the package..................it had been thrown/tossed onto the deck or against the front door. Otherwise, I would not have known it had arrived. In fact, one of the corners of the Amazon box had been dented. So immediately we charged it and then tried it out....so far so good. But whoever packed this dvd player in its original box did a good job, otherwise this dvd player would NOT have survived the impact that it possibly incurred and my positive customer service response would have been entirely different. Enjoy the holidays!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these. The first time they sent me a used one when I paid for a brand new one. They replaced with a new one immediately. Unfortunately, both did not turn ON after being charged for over 24 hrs. The directions say you only need to charge about 6 hrs. This is a shame. I need to return the 2nd one but it isn't letting me submit the request because the 1st one had to be returned too.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The big surprise to me is the clarity of the picture.....I have had several different brands, the first shipment had a battery charge problem, the shipment return was easy, and I received another one in a couple of days, and I am so glad I didn't change to another brand...I enjoy watching movies on it every evening...
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Player quits reading disc. Tray button sticks after just weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: Player has beautiful picture but, tray button sticks after a couple weeks and it quits reading the disk as well. Replaced first plyr thinking it was a fluke, though replacement plyr did the exact same thing. I have no small children and player never received mistreatment. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Kringle29

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend unless want to deal with return
customer_reviews.text: Awful rumbling sound from the cd reader. Sound like an airplane is about to take off. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: K. K.

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for vacation. One will not charge at all and the screen is horribly distorted. Unusable. The other is fine and works well. Not sure how to contact the seller for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Mizanoski

customer_reviews.title: its quite well made and the picture colors are better than i thought would be
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ieGeek Portable DVD Player. its quite well made and the picture colors are better than i thought would be. I recommend this one. It swivels to any position, simple to use, the kids don't need any help at all. I got the red. there's other colors. I wouldn't have one that doesn't swivel after using this one. Prices have come down a lot from what my old one cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Review Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Volume only goes to 20. On regular screen goes up to 100 So obviously this sound is quite low. Very disappointed regarding sound. The picture while not regular screen quality is very good. Just a bit dark. But can see clearly. Good dvd player. Like that has main buttons on dvd itself not just on remote. Good at remembering where left off. Would recommend as long as don't mind the low sound.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Crappy video resolution quality
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, it's a good value for how cheap it is but the picture quality still sucks. It doesn't have a very good volume either. Goes to 20 and we are still straining to hear. Easy to use, charges fast but doesn't last long. I'm keeping it but honestly wouldn't buy it again knowing what I know now about it. I had bought a different one on Amazon about the same time and that one REALLY sucked! Horrible picture so this one was the better of the two at least.
customer_reviews.author: E. Earley

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by this portable DVD player. I purchased this for traveling with my granddaughter and wanted the two ports for dual headphones. The picture quality is awesome the sound is great as well. It charged rather quickly. Easy to understand instructions. I can't answer the batter life because I haven't used it for a long period of time. I have no doubt that it will last the five hours that the seller claims it lasts. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Guastella

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service !!
customer_reviews.text: It has a great picture, sound remote and screen size. My special needs daughter bought this by her part time job. She is tickled to death with the dvd player. Also great customer service, wonderful company, and would definitely buy again 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my studio so I can watch videos while I quilt. I was a little skeptical of the quality of the sound and picture at this price, but was very pleasantly surprised - both were extremely good! This unit has so many features, and the remote (with 44 buttons), which is one reason I selected this model, can control everything. It will read from a USB stick and an SD card. The size is very nice. What more could you ask for? I definitely recommend this player!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a piece of Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This player is awesome. It is not a piece of cheap (lightweight) junk that is available on other websites. It has all chargers (home and auto), a remote and a connection for the TV. the color is a very appealing soft purple. This unit is worth a lot more than what I paid for it. The best thing is that once it is charged, you do not have to keep it plugged in to view a DVD. You also get a special gift when you get your purchase. You will not be disappointed with this item and you will not get anything like this for this price on the internet. Absolutely wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dee glomb

customer_reviews.title: four stars
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review of this product do to the immediate response from this company and the DVD player we received. The first one we received was defective which I posted about. They responded to my problem the very same day and had it replaced immediately. The one we received works perfect. The picture is so clear and audio is great. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: ieGeek portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to exercise with--playing exercise DVD's. It has a great picture quality and is easy to use, and of course portable, so I can use it anywhere. My only concern about it is that the catch to close the lid over the DVD seems a little flimsy. It is working fine so far, but I'm a little worried that the piece might bend or break and I might not be able to use it anymore if the lid won't stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Freese

customer_reviews.title: ieGeek 12.5" Portable DVD Player works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 86 yr old mother to use after her hip-replacement surgery this spring. It works fine, but we haven't tested the battery life. The only complaint I have is that the Power button on the top seems to need a little help from another power button on the side, & it took a little messing around with it to figure that out. None of the other DVD players I've used were that "complicated!" She didn't use it as much as I hoped, but it does work fine, & I like that it comes in many different colors so we don't have to settle for boring black & silver.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: A Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The screen Is no where near as large as the seller advertises it to be, the highest volume achieved on this device is still quite low and the surface easily scratches and smudges. Picture clarity and quality could be better. Image clarity and color is often distorted and dark. Just barely passable as a portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Eden

customer_reviews.title: I'm returning the item. Could not be fixed. Amazon very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I watched a movie first time yesterday and I can't hear the sound with the column on 20, the highest it goes. I'm going to ask tech support for help. Picture is great. Remote has too many buttons for what I'll be using it for but I will figure it out. If I get the volumn fixed, it's perfect. I will love it. I'll send an update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good picture Good sound it has a pause button but no button to stop the dvd
customer_reviews.text: Directions said charging was taking place while the red light was on and when it was fully charged the light would turn green. I charged it for 7 hours and the light never turned green. I used it and it played a movie anyway but I never saw a green light come on to show me it was fully charged. Also I cannot find a place to connect it to my TV like it says in the directions I would be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: The description.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow!!!! The product presentation of this portable DVD player is awesome. Beautiful in fact!!! Good job I.E. gEEK. The description is true to its product. The color is very nice. We got the purple one. It plays nicely. I look forward to the trips we are taking soon to help with toddler boredom.
customer_reviews.author: suzR

customer_reviews.title: Very good !
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this purple portable DVD player! The sound is really good! Big screen! Great price and super fast delivery! I would recommend this to everyone who wants a great DVD player! 5 hour of battery life! Can’t wait to take it camping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good sound good picture great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my two-year-old daughter helps long car trips much more enjoyable. The sound quality is great I haven't even turned it up all the way I read other reviews that you couldn't hear it while we were driving our car is not that quiet and she could hear it just fine not to mention that it has headphone jacks which is awesome. I love the way the screen turns all the way around so that she can't touch the buttons. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Connections galore!
customer_reviews.text: Enough connection points for almost everyone. Processor and system a little slow, but this is not a high end gadget. Speakers are small, and are good for small speakers, but I recommend using a wireless bluetooth for better sound (I use an Oontz Angle 3). Decent gizmo for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Oldtimer

customer_reviews.title: The Gift
customer_reviews.text: When you get your player you also get instructions on how to receive a free gift. It says to write a review and get either a gift card or a headrest mount. I wrote a review and sent them my address. What I got back was a request for more information. In todays world, someone having your information is dangerous, the more information, the more danger you are in. I decided it wasn't worth it. Of course, you can make up your own mind. I'm just saying, beware. As far as the player is concerned, It's OK. Good picture and comes with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in his 80s with memory deficits. He forgets how to use the controls to find his cowboy shows so I bought him this. I checked it out and everything works good. No problem with volume and picture is clear. I have not tried the remote because he will never use it and so far I had no need. Unfortunately I still have to start the movie but maybe he will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture - you can stop playback and when you restart it remembers where you were.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size - good sound - stable picture - although shows finger prints which doesn't bother me. This is just the right size for a portable DVD player and is viewable from appropriate distances. The sound is find for 2 or 3 yards away at level 16 of 20. I would recommend this to anyone looking at similar products and please read other reviews - I think you will find that it is the right one for you:)
customer_reviews.author: Ivanhoe

customer_reviews.title: Broken Right From the Start
customer_reviews.text: We celebrated Christmas early by opening presents today. I was so excited for my little girl to see this gift. We got her a ton of movies to go with it. It didn’t work right out of the box. How disappointing to see your child’s “big present” be broken before she even got to use it. She is so upset and this mom is not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Brooke Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice size screen, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter so she could entertain herself while I worked with older youth group. She has a friend who has one so she was already familiar with it. She loved it. Watched her Barbie movies with a headset and was content the entire evening. She has even preferred to watch it instead of tv. when allowed.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Portable DVD player that does all it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Great screen size for a portable DVD player--I'm used to the smaller 8-9" screens and this one is big enough that it may have a function in the home as well as travel. Picture quality is good, sound is not great but easily boosted with speaker, battery hasn't been tested beyond 2-3 hours but works well for that amount of time. Overall I'm very happy with it--great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Chen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing unit- just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great player! We just bought this for our daughter she is 4. She can operate it and she just loves it! The player came so well packed with all of the extras, amazing it came with the car charger.... we used that on our trip to Wisconsin, and it was perfect! Battery lasts along time, movie after movie! Can’t wait to take it on an airplane ride! Don’t waste your time buying something else just order this unit and you will be extremely pleased! We ordered purple and our daughter was so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I make home dvd's for a large family. I can now test them after a burn at my desk rather than cart everything downstairs. I have purple and Actually I am quit taken with the color
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Plays foreign dvds. Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ieGeek portable DVD player purchase. I was well satisfied with the first one but I have been purchasing dvds from the UK and needed a multi region player. This plays the foreign discs just fine. The player is easy to operate. The picture is excellent as is battery life.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable DVD player. I’m old school and have tons of beloved old DVDs that I can now watch again. Lightweight, easy to use and great picture quality are the key features of this product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young kids and grandparents
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to explain how to use for my parents when helping tend the grandkids. There was no set up, easy instructions, and the display is perfect! My children can run it easily and the volume exceeds my expectations for sure! I would completely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyse James

customer_reviews.title: Defective, Does NOT Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this DVD player on 5/27/20 for a road trip on 5/29/20. Received it within one day on 5/28/20. It did not work. Kept saying "loading." Then it displayed "no disc." I tried 4 different DVDs. It still did not work!!! I am very 😡. It ruined the 5.5 hour road trip for my daughter. I had to let her watch cartoons on my cellphone most of the way to our destination in which she kept touch the cellphone screen, I had to keep fixing it. Disaster🤦! Returning it tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Marquita

customer_reviews.title: Replaced older player
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Replaced a two-year old player of different company that quit on us. Good clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Painful to use
customer_reviews.text: A good player would make the important buttons easy and obvious and bury the rest. This one doesn't. There is no decent hierarchy of use, making this VERY DIFFICULT for anyone young, old or disabled or easily frustrated to operate. It takes forever to load a DVD. Basically, I hate this device.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Reader

customer_reviews.title: Quality Region Free DVD player with large screen
customer_reviews.text: EZ to use. Recognizes region automatically and hence allows playing back DVDs from around the globe. Tried PAL DVD (Great Britain & others). Ideally HDMI connectivity to an HDMI TV would have been better, but the RCA cable connection at least allows watching DVD content on larger screen. Remote buttons are close to each other, but work well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cuonrad

customer_reviews.title: good for one year
customer_reviews.text: This little player was great for the first six months....a bit louder than our old DVD player, but fine. After six months it started not playing most dvds unless there was weight/pressure on the disk area (like the latch doesn't hold the door shut tightly enough). Now one year later and the volume buttons only randomly work and sometimes the buttons make other options come up - other than the button that was pushed. So, great player for one year...if you want one that lasts longer...choose a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: G. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality region free player for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a region free DVD player for my kids to learn additional languages. This little machine is reasonably priced and gets the job done (tried dvds with China and Hong Kong region codes with no issues). Keep in mind that the tv output uses an RCA cable, so you won’t get the sharp images that HDMI provides. But I’m only using this for cartoons, so not a big deal from my perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an upcoming vacation trip. Great little player. Well priced and durable. Picture is good and sound without earphones is much better than I anticipated. I bought a second one for my husband!! Definitely worth it and for that money if I drop it or something happens....no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly's mom

customer_reviews.title: Portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality. Lightweight and love the purple. Only problem is the sound stinks! Have vokume turned ALL THE WAY UP & its STILK hard to hear movie. They DEFINITELY need better speakers, or make an attachment to purchase that will make sound louder!
customer_reviews.author: csihopkins

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our teenage daughter who loved the fun purple color! Her second comment was that the battery life is awesome! Her favorite feature is the many positions the screen can be in. We would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jabailie

customer_reviews.title: Model arriving had 10" screen instead of 12.5"
customer_reviews.text: I returned it as the website described the screen as 12.5 inch and the model that arrived was only ten. This is very mortifying and now I must drive to Kohl's to drop it. Im frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Benavente

customer_reviews.title: Volume terrible
customer_reviews.text: I returned this next day. The reviews were inaccurate. The picture was fuzzy and the volume was terrible. I have a DVD player from 15 years a ago that is 10 times better than this. I was hoping to replace it w an updated version... this was definitely not the one.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great picture size
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item, came perfectly packaged. Worked well and screen size was perfect, there was a slight unevenness at the bend. that Didn’t effect its ability at all. But for aesthetic reasons I opted to exchange it and Unfortunately something went wrong with my account that wouldn’t let me trade it in, so after I am refunded I am definitely going to repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ebae

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DVD...!
customer_reviews.text: purchased dvd for ASL class I am taking . arrived within days. was worried I would have problem learning to use it since I am not very computer or cell phone savvy Quick set up info was easy to follow & with in a very short time I was very comfortable using my DVD. The picture so clear + bright + + this size screen is the perfect size . ( no eye strain) The battery also lasts a long time before a recharge is needed. I cannot think of anything I could suggest for improvement....I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THe ieGeek + HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT !!! jayme
customer_reviews.author: j-me

customer_reviews.title: Good quality player at a really good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable DVD player for my 92 yr old Mother, who has macular degeneration. The picture clarity was really good for her! The sound, however, could be a bit louder. It's necessary for her to wear headphones to hear it well. I was thrilled to be able to get it in her favorite color and it arrived much quicker than expected!
customer_reviews.author: L. Nadaskay

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable DVD Player and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light, portable DVD player that's convenient and handy. The color/picture quality is good. I like that it came with a car plug, as well as the wall plug and cables to connect it to your television. I had an issue and needed help from the iGeek customer service team. They were very friendly and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: From disappointed to totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: On 062419 I used my DVD player for the first time I loved it but noticed a flaw in the screen. I was going to return it a possibly get a new one but before I did that I contacted ieGeek via email to see if they could help me. I received a reply within 24 hours Iris (my customer service rep) advises me they would send me another one. Well by 06/27/19 I received a new DVD player! Get customer service!!! They won me over!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Davis

customer_reviews.title: compact and great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: It is compact so does not take up much space. The picture quality is very good. The problem is that the remote control is tiny and so are the buttons. The descriptions of each button do not make sense. It took me awhile to figure them out, but I did it.
customer_reviews.author: June Teeter

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A TOY!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! NOT A TOY!! THIS DVD PLAYER IS SOLIDLY AND ATTRACTIVELY MADE. THE QUALITY OF THE PICTURE IS AS GOOD AS MY DELL LAPTOP! GEEK PLAYER IS EASY TO USE. I WOULD RECCOMEND THIS MODEL TO EVERYONE! GLAD I CHECKED THE WEB FOR A REVIEW AND MADE THIS PURCHASE. THANKS, I WOULD ORDER FROM YOU AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small DVD player for long car trips (we take multiple long trips every week). This guy does the job, and does it well. Perfect size for stashing under a seat out of view, great sound quality, and good enough picture. For the price, you can't beat it. We just hope it lasts well, it checked off every box on our needs list.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Schepker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as a Christmas Present. She is old school and still has a bunch of DVD's that she likes to watch. This is a great little device .... moderately priced .... Works perfect for when we travel .... the only negative is you have to use a converter to connect to an HDMI Smart Screen TV. Would recommend it for any one else looking for a portable DVD player you can take wherever you go ...
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for homeschool videos. We exchanged one right away as the original dvd cover would not stay closed while a dvd spun. The replacement worked very well for the first 2 months. Now it won’t turn on at all. Unfortunately we are outside of the return window. The other device (purple one) has had no issues whatsoever so maybe the black ones are just duds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very disappointing - tinny. Control buttons feel very flimsy - highly doubt reliability. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: James Metz

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra features!
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable player! It's the size I was looking for and includes features that I didn't anticipate having. Easy to use! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SassyGinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any long trip
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just got this for a upcoming trip. We had on charger for 6hrs. And has full charge she testing it . It's on a 2nd movie. It has great sound . Very clear picture. It is very kid friendly. Please check out my demo
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellance with great features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... This one 100% better then the one that broke on train Moving across country....I was surprised by the game remote control and I was in my glory with great features I love this...Perfect for my CD playing and great for the grandchildren when traveling....I love it Thank you 100%... .
customer_reviews.author: Darlene  Long

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these as Easter gifts for my son and nephew. In June we’ll be traveling 15 hours and thought these would help alleviate some of the boredom. They came wrapped up securely, yet easy to open. Charging did not take long, and I love that it came with car chargers too. We watched a movie on it already and my son keeps begging to watch more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: did not receive car dvd head rest
customer_reviews.text: I love it Best part you can use it with and with out the remote control update Update I left a good review and that did not send me the free head rest dvd cardholder they promised ifthey send it then I’ll gladly update this review
customer_reviews.author: planetgoosback

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Simple to operate. Purchased as a birthday gift for my 4year old grandson. I love it and so does he. Picture quality is great. Looking for a car headrest mount for it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary LaChiusa

customer_reviews.title: great product for kids and road trips.
customer_reviews.text: Great thing for the kid(s) on road trips and at home. Easy to use, decently sized screen and great color options. Doesn't play certain file types, only the standard DVD file type. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Resolution.
customer_reviews.text: I like the screen resolution and the fact that you can move the screen in all different directions. I with the plastic was better quality. When you push the button your can feel how cheap it is. However this is a great product! I've tried other dcd players and the buttons are all the same. I kept this one because the screen quality was the best.
customer_reviews.author: abn100

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this to view her exercise DVD anywhere in the house (since some must be done standing while others are done sitting down or laying down). She absolutely loves it! The battery has never run out during a session, the remote works flawlessly, and the picture and sound are great!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Loved it when I first got it, however it was shot in 3 months. It was used by adults only so it wasn't abused by kids. Also it takes about 4hrs to charge for 5hrs of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Davis

product_meta.title: ieGeek 12.5" Portable DVD Player, Car Travel DVD Players with 5 Hrs Rechargeable Battery, Region-Free Video Player with HD Swivel Screen for Kids Elderly, Remote Control, Sync TV, USB&SD, Black
product_meta.description:
Welcome to “ieGeek”--- ieGeek, Make Your Life Better

ieGeek portable dvd player, a perfect choice as a gift for your Baby’s Birthday, Children’s Day or Christmas

It can be easily attached to the car backseat with a car headrest mount holder to free your hands when watching movies.

*Sync Screen Playing* 
1.Need a bigger display screen?
One AV cable help you. Just match the 3 color lines on the DVD player and TV to start sharing what you loved with your friends and family.
One end of the included AV cable is plugged into the AV output port on the player. The other end is plugged into your TV RCA port.
2. Two kids? Two dvd player, but one dvd?
Don’t worry! Just need an AV TO AV cable, the same dvd players can be connected together so that the same movie can be watched on two players at the same time.
( The AV to AV cable isn’t included in the package)
One player set in DVD mode to play DVDs, AV cable plugged into AVOUT port, the other player set in AV mode, AV cable plugged into AVIN port.

*More Function*
1. One-key Mute Playing 
ieGeek portable dvd player has a “Mute” button. Need to answer an important call, but considering the video sound.
Now you do not need to be continually press the “volume “ to turn down volume, just hit the “Mute” button, the video will be in a mute.
2. Resume Function
ieGeek portable dvd player support DVD, USB & SD Card Memory Playing.
If you need to do other things while watching film, enable last-memory function, you can continue to watch it instead of restarting after finishing the work.
3. Repeat
When you watch a video or listen a song, enable the repeat function, which can play your files on a loop.

*Package Content*
1x ieGeek 12.5" Portable DVD Player
1x Remote Controller
1x Power Adapter
1x Car Charger
1x AV Cable
1x User Manual
feature_bullets: 5 HOURS PLAYING TIME--- With the upgraded 5 hours playing lithium battery, ensure 5 hours lasting time (2 whole films). Not enough? Do not worry. We provide extra 5.9 ft AC power adapter and car charger in the package, ensure you can enjoy your happiness.

REGION FREE DVD PLAYER --- ieGeek portable DVD players support DVD, DVD+R(-R), DVD+RW(-RW), CD-R(RW), SVCD-R(RW), VCD, CD, MP3, MPEG, AVI, VOB, and can directly play with USB and SD card to enjoy your favorite movies and music.

SYNC SCREEN PLAYING--- an AV to AV cable to help you share a same movie with two dvd player. An AV to RCA cable (included in package) allows it to be connected to a TV for you to enjoy your private theater on a big screen.

UPGRADED TECHNOLOGY---Upgraded Laser to guarantee for a better compatibility to read more disc formats. Adopt an anti-shock and Resume Function technology to ensure you won’t experience any interruption in the playing.

ENHANCED BRIGHTNESS PROTECTIVE SWIVEL SCREEN---10.5 inch swivel screen supports 270 degrees rotation and 180 degrees folding back. ieGeek DVD player could be tied to the car seat, brings ultimate visual enjoyments to your road trip.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars486 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
